name: rainbow ridge scarf
notes:
**a beginner-friendly tunisian crochet rib stitch super scarf with rainbow color blocks**

meet the rainbow ridge scarf, a tunisian crochet stunner featuring the entire 25-color apricity palette. master the rib stitch in this soothing, repetitive pattern as you advance from one hue to the next. the pdf pattern simplifies the process, making it ideal for both newbies and pros looking to brighten their winter wardrobes with some rainbow realness.

**[free pattern available here!][1]** 

**materials**
-apricity yarn in 25 colors, or 5 full skeins of apricity. substitute 220-250 grams of your preferred bulky weight yarn
-scissors
-tapestry needle
-steam blocking supplies


**difficulty**
beginner. pattern includes row-by-row instructions, plus a link to a helpful stitch tutorial video. for a full pattern tutorial, join the [yarn hive community][2]. 

**techniques**
-tunisian crochet foundation
-working with chunky yarn
-color changes
-tunisian crochet bind off
-steam blocking

**size**
one size - 84" long x 7" wide. adjust stitches in even number to make it wider/ narrower. adjust rows to desired length. 


  [1]: http://tlycblog.com/rainbow-ridge-scarf-a-free-tunisian-crochet-rib-stitch-scarf-pattern
  [2]: http://www.yarnhivecommunity.com
